Articles.Content:
So I have had this game now for a while now. Guy on youtube Robbaz from one of his videos and i got the demo 2 days later I got the full game.

I love it, the rush I get when am about to land on the Mun\'s never had that in a game before.

I am really looking forward to all the updates new parts EVas and that. More so looking forward to seeing Kerbal get city\'s and seeing there architecture, street planing (with the kerbal way of doing things with no Health and safety) will other parts of the planet heavy populated Mountain ranges, Probably wishful thinking but i would like to see tides on kerbal. Looking how the continents are now there would be some hellish tides. (sayign that the Mun is very far away so prob wouldn\'t have that much force)

Its also good to see the community how it is now Mature and good hearted. I like seeign the devs communicate with the players and I wish them luck with this game.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Guy on youtube Robbaz from one of his videos and i got the demo 2 days later I got the full game.

Robbaz\'s space plane video is pure gold .
